name: Youtube gray background
description:
Changes the new white background back to gray.
Only works on the new YouTube design.
Based on: http://userstyles.org/styles/57702/another-youtube-style
additional_info:
Update: 2012-11-04
First version.

Update: 2013-02-14
The dislike bar is red again.
Hides "Feedback" button.

Update: 2013-03-17
More of the background is gray.

Update: 2013-03-17 (again)
All of the page is now gray.

Update: 2013-06-04
Removed the hiding "Feedback" code.

Update: 2013-11-16
Fixed the new Google+ comment system, it is gray now.

Update: 2013-11-23
Like/dislike is now their correct color (Green and red).
Sidebar works now.

Update: 2014-04-20
The script works once again.
More of the subscription page is gray.
The guide is gray now.
The bar at the top is now gray when expanded.
